name: 安振吉
objective:
不只是桌球課 藉由學習桌球的課程中  學習桌球運動領域的相關英文術語
More than Table Tennis
schedule:
01 week: Note for class
上課注意事項及學期成績考核說明
02 week: Introduction of paddle grip and ball sense practice, backhand against 
                the wall demonstration and practice
握拍及基本動作講解示範
03 week:Backhand against the wall practice
反手對牆擊球練習
04 week:Backhand against the wall practice
反手對牆擊球練習
05 week:backhand against the wall practice 
反手對牆擊球練習
06 week:Backhand against the wall
反手對牆擊球練習
07 week:Backhand against the wall
反手對牆擊球練習
08 week:Backhand push demostration and test
反手對牆擊球練習測驗及反手推球講解示範
09 week:Introduction of forehand serve rule 
正手發球規則講解及示範
10 week:Introduction of forehand topspin and backspin serve
正手發上旋球及下旋球講解及示範
11 week:Introduction of forehand sidespin and insideout serve
正手發側旋球及逆旋轉球講解及示範
12 week:Introduction of backhand serve
反手發球講解及示範
13 week:Backhand push practice
反手推球練習
14 week:Introduction and demostration of forehand stroke 
正手擊球示範講解
15 week:Introduction of side by side footwork
步法介紹
16 week:Backhand push test
反手推球測驗
17 week:Jumping rope test 
跳繩測驗
18 week:Make-up exam
補考
scorePolicy:
Attendance record 50%
出席 50%
Skill test 40% (Backhand push against the wall and Backhand push)
技術測驗 40%
Jumping rope 10% (60 seconds)
體能測驗 10%
consultation: Thursday Morning 8:00~14:00 in 3rd Acadamic Building Room 102 星期四早上 8:00~14:00 第三教學大樓 102 室
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）
remarks: 上課學生需要攜帶自己的球拍 Students must be bring own table tennis racket
